n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

answer = 1
for i in range(1, n):
    if h[i] >= max(h[0:i]):
        answer += 1
print(answer)

num_mountains = int(input())
heights = list(map(int, input().split()))

num_ocean_view = 1  # given that you can see the ocean from the westmost mountain
for i in range(1, num_mountains):
    if heights[i] >= max(heights[:i]):
        num_ocean_view += 1

print(num_ocean_view)

N = int(input())
H = list(map(int, input().split()))

# initialize the counter
count = 1

for i in range(1, N):
    if H[i] <= min(H[:i]):
        count += 1

print(count)

N = int(input())
H = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 1
for i in range(1, N):
    if H[i] < H[i-1]:
        break
    count += 1

print(count)

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0

for i in range(n):
    if all(h[i] >= h[j] for j in range(i)):
        cnt += 1

print(cnt)
